dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] urgent abuse case]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, December 04, 2005 5:17 PM
To: doctorcinque@hotmail.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] urgent abuse case]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] urgent abuse case
Date:         Thu, 01 Dec 2005 14:41:04 -0600
From:         Dr. Ralph Cinque <doctorcinque@hotmail.com>
To:         abuse@theplanet.com



Please help me with a criminal matter. There is an outfit that you host at
http://hghspray.pillslist.info who has pirated all of my site materials, and
until yesterday, he was even posting my picture along with a phony name, one
Dr. Andrew Johnson. He knows that I am on to him, and as of this morning, he
took off my picture and replaced it with a graph. But I kept copies. He is
still using all of my other materials.
Click on his link entitled "Report" and scroll down to the bottom of it.
The phone number you will see listed, 512 295 4256, is my phone number,
which he attributes to a "Dr. Johnson". He just did a "find and replace"
to substitute that name for my name, but he foolishly left my phone number.

I have talked to the FBI and they have opened an investigation of him and
given it a case number: 105120112048323. I believe his name is Paul King,
and I believe he has an associate, one Octav M. I don't know his last name.
They are based out of Montreal, Canada, it seems, and they have a
fulfillment center in Grawn, Michigan. I am asking you to shut down that
site, and by the way, they have other sites under pillsexpert.com which may
be bogus too.

My name is Dr. Ralph Cinque. My phone is 512 295 4256. My email is
doctorcinque@hotmail.com <mailto:doctorcinque@hotmail.com>. My web address
(from which they stole the materials) is www.hgh2live.com
<http://www.hgh2live.com>. Please put a stop to this right away. I know that
your company is not the least bit in the wrong, and in a way, you are
victims too. I would appreciate your immediate assistance. Dr. Ralph Cinque


- ------------------------------------------------------------------------
Get MSN Messenger with FREE Video Conversation - the next best thing to
being there! <http://g.msn.com/8HMBENUS/2755??PS=47575>

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFDk3j9vK/XpJs6oyURAqpOAKCf+REeCuvKue3AkCeCs+X4s2IczACfS0KO
Q2D3HpOfkwjQox6MQN06BiA=
=6JMU
